commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, we've just got two more left. I want us to share information on any promising girls while we discuss where Setsuna might be.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: No one I asked knew where Setsuna was.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, I asked everyone I could and got squat. This is a tough one!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Looks like we'll have to make a School Idol Setsuna Yuki Search Team.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: ...Er... And what does that entail?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: We form an official search team and gather up eyewitness information from all over the school!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: That's a...little dramatic.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: ...But sounds fun.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I think that's what it'll take to find Setsuna, personally.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Finding Setsuna sounds like it'll be tough.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: No one in our year knows her, either. What year was she, again?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Well, she was famous from flying solo already, so there's no way she's a first year, right?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: We're a really big school, so I think we'll have a lot of trouble if we don't have a lead.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: But no one we've asked has seen her anywhere.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yeah...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: ...Hey, maybe...and this is a big maybe. Maybe this is a trap on the president's part?!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: A trap?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What are you talking about, Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Like, what if she kidnapped Setsuna so we'd waste all our time looking for her? Because I mean, you only really need five people to run a club!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: ...You're right. This should be enough people to run a club, easy. That's what the rules say, too.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: How about we try negotiating with her?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But we made a promise with the president, and I want to keep it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Once we start this school idol thing, we're going to face way tougher challenges. I want us to do our best now, so we can get to where we need to be.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And don't worry. Since we're doing what we love, this is going to go really well - we'll see Setsuna, too. And I'm sure she'll come back then.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You really do love school idols, don't you?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, don't we all?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You know, you're right. Let's look for Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yeah, let's give it a shot.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Sure!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "Let's do this!"

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We've still got time till the end of the month, so let's give it our best!

commands.speaker: Student Council President
commands.line: Just as I thought! I knew you would do your best to gather up ten members and revive the club!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: P-President?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Huh? What? Wh-What's going on?

commands.speaker: Student Council President
commands.line: Ahh, nuts, I did it again! I forgot to turn off student president mode!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Student...president mode? W-Wait, president, are you...Setsuna Yuki?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: That's right. I'm Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Now do you believe me?

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Hwah?!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Sh-She really is Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: N-No way. I can't believe Setsuna was the student council president!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Wait, you saw her at assemblies but didn't recognize her? Even though you used to work together?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: That's when I always sleep.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm shocked that I couldn't recognize her.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You're the student council president and a school idol at the same time? Th-That's no fair. And I can't believe I called you a robot, Setsuna!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Haha, well... I was pretty mean to you, so you shouldn't worry about that. I'm the one who should apologize.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Whine* Setsunaaa!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: B-But, why'd you tell us to do something as tough as get ten members? You didn't want the club to get disbanded either, right?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I wanted to keep it going, but...I was afraid. Since I'm the one who brought us this low.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: No one thinks it's your fault, Setsuna!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: No, I loved school idols so much and couldn't contain it. I wanted to share those feelings with everyone, so I pushed so much onto you girls.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I knew it wasn't right, but I couldn't help myself. And I was really afraid that would distance me from all of you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But you were watching over us while playing it off as coincidence, right? Doesn't that mean you want to start things over, too?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I figured that...if you were passionate enough to gather up ten people, it might actually work this time. Haha, pretty selfish of me, huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Not at all! And hear us out: We thought up a new way of doing things for the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yeah, Setsuna, she came up with a really nice ideaaa.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, I think it'll really work out for us!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That's right! So you'll come back too, right Setsuna?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Look at how many idol hopefuls we have! Join our new school idol club, Setsuna!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Girls...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I'm a little worried, though. What if I start again, and my love of idols goes wild?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Don't worry! Let me take all that love and use it to cheer you all on!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Because everyone here loves school idols, too! You're among friends!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line:
Thank you. Thank you so much!
Please, let me officially join the school idol club!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Now we've got nine members! And it feels like we'll find our tenth really soon!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh, I think we've already found her.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Everyone knows, right?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You're the only one who hasn't figured it out.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You're being quite dense.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You really can't tell?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Even I can tell, and I'm half asleeeep.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Who's the one who brought us all together?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: The person who was so nervous on the first day she dashed the opposite direction of the student council room!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? Er...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I told you to get ten members of the school idol club, but I didn't tell you to get ten school idols.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I'm looking right at the tenth.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: It's you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Me?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: The school idol club is back in business!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Th-Thank you, everyone! Now I can cheer you school idols on!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: There is just one thing I'd like to ask, since we've started again. I want you to be our new chief!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?! Me?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: You're the one who brought us all together and made the club again. If you're at the center, I'm sure it'll work out this time!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm for it! I mean, you're the one who got us into this!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I think it's a good idea, too! Without you, I don't think I would have been able to be so honest about wanting to return.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yeah, without you, those tests would have destroyed me.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: No one's got any objections, right?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: ...Well, how about it?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I-I promise to always be on your side, everyone, no matter what happens! I'll cheer you on with everything I've got!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: All right, Chief, what's the first thing our club's going to do?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, um, we could go for...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Go for what?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: The what?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: THAT'S what we're starting with?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, that's where all of the school idol fans gather, right? It's like a school idol culture festival!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I want us to be in the School Idol Festival as Nijigasaki High School's idols!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Y-You really think we can pull it off?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Aim for the top.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Rina's right, it's a pretty big target, but that makes it all the more worth overcoming!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: W-Well... If you say so, I'll do my best!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: This is no time for napping, huh?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: All right, my soul's on fire now!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: It's the stage of my dreams!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: The biggest school idol event, with idols from all over the country!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That means 's and Aqours are going to be there, too! We'll be on the same stage as them, it'll be huge!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The Nijigasaki High School Idol Club is back in business! Let's do our best, everyone!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
